entry.title: TV's Crypto Hype Man Worries People on TV Are Hyping Crypto Too Much
entry.summary:
Jim Cramer, the TV clown your grandpa watches when he canâ€™t find the remote, had some horrifying news for viewers of his CNBC program Mad Money on Tuesday. Apparently there are people on TV who are over-hyping crypto, according to Cramer. Yes, you read that correctly.
